items.title: Awesome Python Data Science
items.content_text:
### Reinforcement Learning / Others

*   [Shimmy (⭐173)](https://github.com/Farama-Foundation/Shimmy) - An API conversion tool for popular external reinforcement learning environments.
*   [EnvPool (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/sail-sg/envpool) - C++-based high-performance parallel environment execution engine (vectorized env) for general RL environments.
items.content_html:
Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • Shimmy (⭐173) - An API conversion tool for popular external reinforcement learning environments.
  • EnvPool (⭐1.2k) - C++-based high-performance parallel environment execution engine (vectorized env) for general RL environments.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Calendar & Contacts

*   [DAViCal](https://www.davical.org/) - Server for calendar sharing (CalDAV) that uses a PostgreSQL database as a data store. ([Source Code](https://gitlab.com/davical-project/davical)) `GPL-2.0` `PHP/deb`
*   [Radicale](https://radicale.org/) - Simple calendar and contact server with extremely low administrative overhead. ([Source Code (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/Kozea/Radicale)) `GPL-3.0` `Python/deb`
*   [Xandikos (⭐502)](https://github.com/jelmer/xandikos) - Open source CardDAV and CalDAV server with minimal administrative overhead, backed by a Git repository. `GPL-3.0` `Python/deb`

### Software / Feed Readers

*   [Feedpushr (⭐369)](https://github.com/ncarlier/feedpushr) - Powerful RSS aggregator, able to transform and send articles to many outputs. Single binary, extensible with plugins. `GPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [JARR](https://1pxsolidblack.pl/jarr-en.html) - JARR (Just Another RSS Reader) is a web-based news aggregator and reader (fork of Newspipe). ([Demo](https://www.jarr.info/), [Source Code (⭐125)](https://github.com/jaesivsm/JARR)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`
*   [RSS-Bridge (⭐8.1k)](https://github.com/RSS-Bridge/rss-bridge) - Generate RSS/ATOM feeds for websites which don't have one. `Unlicense` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / File Transfer & Synchronization

*   [ownCloud](https://owncloud.org/) - All-in-one solution for saving, synchronizing, viewing, editing and sharing files, calendars, address books and more. ([Source Code (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/owncloud/core), [Clients (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/owncloud/core/wiki/Apps)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker/deb`
*   [Syncthing](https://syncthing.net/) - Syncthing is an open source peer-to-peer file synchronisation tool. ([Source Code (⭐73k)](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing)) `MPL-2.0` `Go/Docker/deb`
*   [Unison](https://www.cis.upenn.edu/~bcpierce/unison/) - Unison is a file-synchronization tool for OSX, Unix, and Windows. ([Source Code (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/bcpierce00/unison)) `GPL-3.0` `deb/OCaml`

### Software / File Transfer - Object Storage & File Servers

*   [SFTPGo (⭐11k)](https://github.com/drakkan/sftpgo) - Flexible, fully featured and highly configurable SFTP server with optional FTP/S and WebDAV support. `AGPL-3.0` `Go/deb/Docker`
*   [Zenko CloudServer](https://www.zenko.io/cloudserver) - Zenko CloudServer, an open-source implementation of a server handling the Amazon S3 protocol. ([Source Code (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/scality/cloudserver)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/Nodejs`

### Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

*   [Gokapi (⭐2k)](https://github.com/Forceu/gokapi) - Lightweight server to share files, which expire after a set amount of downloads or days. Similar to the discontinued Firefox Send, with the difference that only the admin is allowed to upload files. `GPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [Sharry (⭐1k)](https://github.com/eikek/sharry) - Share files easily over the internet between authenticated and anonymous users (both ways) with resumable up- and downloads. `GPL-3.0` `Scala/Java/deb/Docker`
*   [XBackBone](https://xbackbone.app/) - A simple, fast and lightweight file manager with instant sharing tools integration, like ShareX (a free and open-source screenshot utility for Windows). ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/SergiX44/XBackBone)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [Zipline (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/diced/zipline) - A lightweight, fast and reliable file sharing server that is commonly used with ShareX, offering a react-based Web UI and fast API. `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`

### Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

*   [FileGator](https://filegator.io/) - FileGator is a powerful multi-user file manager with a single page front-end. ([Demo](https://demo.filegator.io), [Source Code (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/filegator/filegator)) `MIT` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Games

*   [The Battle for Wesnoth (⭐6k)](https://github.com/wesnoth/wesnoth) - The Battle for Wesnoth is an Open Source, turn-based tactical strategy game with a high fantasy theme, featuring both singleplayer and online/hotseat multiplayer combat. `GPL-2.0` `C++/deb`

### Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

*   [Sunshine](https://app.lizardbyte.dev/Sunshine/) - Remote game stream host for Moonlight with support up to 120 frames per second and 4K resolution. ([Source Code (⭐27k)](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine)) `GPL-3.0` `C++/deb/Docker`

### Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

*   [Node RED](https://nodered.org/) - Browser-based flow editor that helps you wiring hardware devices, APIs and online services to create IoT solutions. ([Source Code (⭐21k)](https://github.com/node-red/node-red)) `Apache-2.0` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [Thingsboard](https://thingsboard.io/) - Open-source IoT Platform - Device management, data collection, processing and visualization. ([Demo](https://demo.thingsboard.io/signup), [Source Code (⭐19k)](https://github.com/thingsboard/thingsboard)) `Apache-2.0` `Java/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

*   [OwnTracks Recorder (⭐1k)](https://github.com/owntracks/recorder) `⚠` - Store and access data published by [OwnTracks](https://owntracks.org/) location tracking apps. `GPL-2.0` `C/Lua/deb/Docker`
*   [TileServer GL](https://tileserver.readthedocs.io/) - Vector and raster maps with GL styles. Server side rendering by Mapbox GL Native. Map tile server for Mapbox GL JS, Android, iOS, Leaflet, OpenLayers, GIS via WMTS, etc. ([Source Code (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/maptiler/tileserver-gl)) `BSD-2-Clause` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [Beets](https://beets.io/) - Music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger (command-line and Web interface). ([Source Code (⭐14k)](https://github.com/beetbox/beets)) `MIT` `Python/deb`
*   [gonic (⭐2k)](https://github.com/sentriz/gonic) - Lightweight music streaming server. Subsonic compatible. `GPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [LMS (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/epoupon/lms) - Access your self-hosted music using a web interface. `GPL-3.0` `Docker/deb/C++`
*   [musikcube](https://musikcube.com/) - Streaming audio server with Linux/macOS/Windows/Android clients. ([Source Code (⭐4.5k)](https://github.com/clangen/musikcube)) `BSD-3-Clause` `C++/deb`
*   [Polaris (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/agersant/polaris) - Music browsing and streaming application optimized for large music collections, ease of use and high performance. `MIT` `Rust/Docker`
*   [Snapcast (⭐6.8k)](https://github.com/badaix/snapcast) - Synchronous multiroom audio server. `GPL-3.0` `C++/deb`
*   [SwingMusic](https://swingmusic.vercel.app/) - Swing Music is a beautiful, self-hosted music player and streaming server for your local audio files. Like a cooler Spotify ... but bring your own music. ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/swing-opensource/swingmusic)) `MIT` `Python/Docker`

### Software / Media Streaming - Multimedia Streaming

*   [Karaoke Eternal](https://www.karaoke-eternal.com) - Host awesome karaoke parties where everyone can easily find and queue songs from their phone's browser. The player is also fully browser-based with support for MP3+G, MP4 and WebGL visualizations. ([Source Code](https://www.karaoke-eternal.com/repo)) `ISC` `Docker/Nodejs`
*   [Kodi](https://kodi.tv/) - Multimedia/Entertainment center, formerly known as XBMC. Runs on Android, BSD, Linux, macOS, iOS and Windows. ([Source Code (⭐20k)](https://github.com/xbmc/xbmc)) `GPL-2.0` `C++/deb`
*   [Stash](https://stashapp.cc) - A web-based library organizer and player for your adult media stash, with auto-tagging and metadata scraping support. ([Source Code (⭐11k)](https://github.com/stashapp/stash)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Go`
*   [µStreamer (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/pikvm/ustreamer) - Lightweight and very quick server to stream MJPEG video from any V4L2 device to the net. `GPL-3.0` `C/deb`

### Software / Media Streaming - Video Streaming

*   [Invidious (⭐18k)](https://github.com/iv-org/invidious) `⚠` - Alternative YouTube front-end. ([Demo](https://docs.invidious.io/instances/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Crystal`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org) - Server tools for maintaining an F-Droid repository system. ([Source Code](https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroidserver)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python/Docker/deb`
*   [graph-vl (⭐64)](https://github.com/verifid/graph-vl) - Identity document verification using Machine Learning and GraphQL. `MIT` `Python/Docker/K8S`
*   [Koillection](https://koillection.github.io/) - Koillection is a service allowing users to manage any kind of collections. ([Source Code (⭐885)](https://github.com/benjaminjonard/koillection)) `MIT` `Docker/PHP`
*   [Teleport](https://goteleport.com/) - Certificate authority and access plane for SSH, Kubernetes, web applications, and databases. ([Source Code (⭐19k)](https://github.com/gravitational/teleport)) `Apache-2.0` `Go/Docker/K8S`
*   [TeslaMate (⭐6.9k)](https://github.com/adriankumpf/teslamate) - A powerful data logger for Tesla vehicles. `MIT` `Elixir/Docker`
*   [WeeWX](https://weewx.com/) - Open source software for your weather station. ([Demo](https://weewx.com/showcase.html), [Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/weewx/weewx)) `GPL-3.0` `Python/deb`

### Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

*   [Firefly III](https://firefly-iii.org/) - Firefly III is a modern financial manager. It helps you to keep track of your money and make budget forecasts. It supports credit cards, has an advanced rule engine and can import data from many banks. ([Demo](https://demo.firefly-iii.org/), [Source Code (⭐20k)](https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Note-taking & Editors

*   [draw.io](https://draw.io) - Diagram software for making flowcharts, process diagrams, org charts, UML, ER and network diagrams. ([Source Code (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/jgraph/drawio)) `Apache-2.0` `Javascript/Docker`
*   [Livebook](https://livebook.dev) - Realtime collaborative notebook app based on Markdown that supports running Elixir code snippets, TeX and Mermaid Diagrams. Easily deployed using Docker or Elixir. ([Source Code (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/livebook-dev/livebook)) `Apache-2.0` `Elixir/Docker`

### Software / Office Suites

*   [ONLYOFFICE](https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/faq/server-opensource.aspx) - Office suite that enables you to manage documents, projects, team and customer relations in one place. ([Source Code (⭐5.6k)](https://github.com/ONLYOFFICE/DocumentServer)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Password Managers

*   [PassIt](https://passit.io/) - Simple password manage with sharing features by group and user, but no administration interface. ([Demo](https://app.passit.io/), [Source Code](https://gitlab.com/passit)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Django`
*   [Vaultwarden (⭐47k)](https://github.com/dani-garcia/vaultwarden) - Lightweight Bitwarden server API implementation written in Rust. `GPL-3.0` `Rust/Docker`

### Software / Pastebins

*   [dpaste](https://dpaste.org/) - Simple pastebin with multiple text and code option, with short url result easy to remember. ([Source Code (⭐572)](https://github.com/DarrenOfficial/dpaste)) `MIT` `Docker/Django`
*   [Hemmelig](https://hemmelig.app) - Share encrypted secrets cross organizations, or as private persons. ([Source Code (⭐896)](https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`
*   [Wastebin (⭐574)](https://github.com/matze/wastebin) - Lightweight, minimal and fast pastebin with an SQLite backend. ([Demo](https://bin.bloerg.net)) `MIT` `Rust/Docker`
*   [YABin (⭐186)](https://github.com/Yureien/YABin) - A pastebin that contains plentiful features while remaining simple. Supports optional E2E encryption, a client-side CLI app, syntax highlighting, minimalistic UI, APIs, keyboard shortcuts, and more. It can even be run in serverless environments. ([Demo](https://bin.sohamsen.me/)) `MIT` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Personal Dashboards

*   [LinkStack](https://linkstack.org/) - Link all your social media platforms easily accessible on one page, customizable through an intuitive, easy to use user/admin interface (alternative to Linktree and Manylink). ([Demo](https://linksta.cc/), [Source Code (⭐3k)](https://github.com/LinkStackOrg/LinkStack)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Photo Galleries

*   [Chevereto](https://chevereto.com/) - Ultimate image sharing software. Create your very own personal image hosting website in just minutes. ([Source Code (⭐730)](https://github.com/chevereto/chevereto)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [PhotoPrism](https://photoprism.org) - Personal photo management powered by Go and Google TensorFlow.  Browse, organize, and share your personal photo collection, using the latest technologies to automatically tag and find pictures. ([Demo](https://demo.photoprism.app/library/browse), [Source Code (⭐38k)](https://github.com/photoprism/photoprism)) `AGPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [SPIS (⭐169)](https://github.com/gbbirkisson/spis) - A simple, lightweight and fast media server with decent mobile support. `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Rust`

### Software / Polls and Events

*   [docassemble](https://docassemble.org/) - A free, open-source expert system for guided interviews and document assembly, based on Python, YAML, and Markdown. ([Demo](https://demo.docassemble.org/run/legal), [Source Code (⭐857)](https://github.com/jhpyle/docassemble)) `MIT` `Docker/Python`
*   [Fider](https://fider.io) - Open platform to collect and prioritize feedback (alternative to UserVoice). ([Demo](https://demo.fider.io), [Source Code (⭐3.6k)](https://github.com/getfider/fider)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Proxy

*   [sish (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/antoniomika/sish) - HTTP(S)/WS(S)/TCP tunnels to localhost using only SSH (serveo/ngrok alternative). `MIT` `Go/Docker`
*   [socks5-proxy-server (⭐122)](https://github.com/nskondratev/socks5-proxy-server) - SOCKS5 proxy server with built-in authentication and Telegram-bot for user management and user statistics on data spent (handy when you pay per GB of data). It is dockerised and simple to install. `Apache-2.0` `Docker`

### Software / Resource Planning

*   [LedgerSMB](https://ledgersmb.org/) - Integrated accounting and ERP system for small and midsize businesses, with double entry accounting, budgeting, invoicing, quotations, projects, orders and inventory management, shipping and more. ([Demo](https://demo.cloud.efficito.com/erp/1.5/login.pl), [Source Code (⭐481)](https://github.com/ledgersmb/LedgerSMB)) `GPL-2.0` `Docker/Perl`
*   [Odoo](https://www.odoo.com) - Free open source ERP system. ([Demo](https://demo.odoo.com/), [Source Code (⭐44k)](https://github.com/odoo/odoo)) `LGPL-3.0` `Python/deb/Docker`

### Software / Search Engines

*   [Jina (⭐22k)](https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/) - Cloud-native neural search framework for any kind of data. `Apache-2.0` `Python/Docker`
*   [MeiliSearch](https://www.meilisearch.com) - Ultra relevant, instant and typo-tolerant full-text search API. ([Source Code (⭐52k)](https://github.com/meilisearch/MeiliSearch)) `MIT` `Rust/Docker/deb`
*   [sist2 (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/simon987/sist2) - Lightning-fast file system indexer and search tool. `GPL-3.0` `C/Docker`
*   [Typesense](https://typesense.org) - Blazing fast, typo-tolerant open source search engine optimized for developer happiness and ease of use. ([Source Code (⭐24k)](https://github.com/typesense/typesense)) `GPL-3.0` `C++/Docker/K8S/deb`
*   [Yacy](https://yacy.net/en/index.html) - Peer based, decentralized search engine server. ([Source Code (⭐3.6k)](https://github.com/yacy/yacy_search_server)) `GPL-2.0` `Java/Docker/K8S`
*   [ZincSearch](https://zincsearch.com) - Search engine that requires minimal resources (alternative to Elasticsearch). ([Demo (⭐17k)](https://github.com/zinclabs/zinc#playground-server), [Source Code (⭐17k)](https://github.com/zincsearch/zincsearch)) `Apache-2.0` `Go/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Software Development - API Management

*   [DreamFactory](https://www.dreamfactory.com/) - Turns any SQL/NoSQL/Structured data into Restful API. ([Source Code (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/dreamfactorysoftware/dreamfactory)) `Apache-2.0` `PHP/Docker/K8S`
*   [form.io](https://form.io) - A REST API building platform that utilizes a drag & drop form builder, and is application framework agnostic. Contains open source and enterprise version. ([Demo](https://portal.form.io), [Source Code](https://github.com/formio)) `MIT` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [Fusio](https://www.fusio-project.org/) - Open-source API management platform which helps to build and manage REST APIs. ([Demo](https://fusio-project.org/demo), [Source Code (⭐2k)](https://github.com/apioo/fusio)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [Hasura](https://hasura.io) - Fast, instant realtime GraphQL APIs on Postgres with fine grained access control, also trigger webhooks on database events. ([Source Code (⭐32k)](https://github.com/hasura/graphql-engine)) `Apache-2.0` `Haskell/Docker/K8S`
*   [Para](https://paraio.org) - Flexible and modular backend framework/server for object persistence, API development and authentication. ([Source Code (⭐545)](https://github.com/erudika/para)) `Apache-2.0` `Java/Docker`
*   [Tyk](https://tyk.io) - Fast and scalable open source API Gateway. Out of the box, Tyk offers an API Management Platform with an API Gateway, API Analytics, Developer Portal and API Management Dashboard. ([Source Code (⭐10k)](https://github.com/TykTechnologies/tyk)) `MPL-2.0` `Go/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

*   [Atheos](https://www.atheos.io) - Web-based IDE framework with a small footprint and minimal requirements, continued from Codiad. ([Source Code (⭐551)](https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos)) `MIT` `PHP/Docker`
*   [Coder](https://coder.com/) - Remote development machines on your own infrastructure. ([Source Code (⭐10k)](https://github.com/coder/coder)) `AGPL-3.0` `Go/Docker/K8S/deb`
*   [Lowdefy](https://www.lowdefy.com/) - Build internal tools, BI dashboards, admin panels, CRUD apps and workflows in minutes using YAML / JSON on an self-hosted, open-source platform. Connect to your data sources, host via Serverless, Netlify or Docker. ([Source Code (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/lowdefy/lowdefy)) `Apache-2.0` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [Wakapi](https://wakapi.dev/) - Tracking tool for coding statistics, compatible with WakaTime. ([Source Code (⭐3.5k)](https://github.com/muety/wakapi)) `GPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`

### Software / Software Development - Localization

*   [Traduora](https://traduora.co) - Translation management platform for teams. ([Source Code (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/ever-co/ever-traduora)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/K8S/Nodejs`

### Software / Software Development - Low Code

*   [ToolJet](https://tooljet.io/) - Low-code framework to build & deploy internal tools with minimal engineering effort (alternative to Retool & Mendix). ([Source Code (⭐36k)](https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet)) `GPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Software Development - Project Management

*   [GitLab](https://about.gitlab.com) - Self Hosted Git repository management, code reviews, issue tracking, activity feeds and wikis. ([Demo](https://gitlab.com/), [Source Code](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-foss)) `MIT` `Ruby/deb/Docker/K8S`
*   [Klaus (⭐691)](https://github.com/jonashaag/klaus) - Simple, easy-to-set-up Git web viewer that Just Works. `ISC` `Python/Docker`
*   [Octobox](https://octobox.io/) `⚠` - Take back control of your GitHub Notifications. ([Source Code (⭐4.4k)](https://github.com/octobox/octobox)) `AGPL-3.0` `Ruby/Docker`
*   [OneDev](https://onedev.io/) - All-In-One DevOps Platform. With Git Management, Issue Tracking, and CI/CD. Simple yet Powerful. ([Source Code](https://code.onedev.io/projects/160)) `MIT` `Java/Docker/K8S`
*   [Review Board](https://www.reviewboard.org/) - Extensible and friendly code review tool for projects and companies of all sizes. ([Demo](https://demo.reviewboard.org/), [Source Code (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/reviewboard/reviewboard)) `MIT` `Python/Docker`
*   [SCM Manager](https://www.scm-manager.org/) - The easiest way to share and manage your Git, Mercurial and Subversion repositories over http. ([Source Code (⭐147)](https://github.com/scm-manager/scm-manager)) `BSD-3-Clause` `Java/deb/Docker/K8S`
*   [Titra](https://titra.io/) - Time-tracking solution for freelancers and small teams. ([Source Code (⭐429)](https://github.com/kromitgmbh/titra)) `GPL-3.0` `Javascript/Docker`

### Software / Task Management & To-do Lists

*   [Focalboard](https://www.focalboard.com/) - Define, organize, track and manage work across individuals and teams (alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana). ([Source Code (⭐24k)](https://github.com/mattermost/focalboard), [Clients](https://www.focalboard.com/download/personal-edition/desktop/)) `MIT/AGPL-3.0/Apache-2.0` `Nodejs/Go/Docker`
*   [Planka](https://planka.app/) - Realtime kanban board for workgroups (alternative to Trello). ([Demo](https://plankanban.github.io/planka/#/), [Source Code (⭐10k)](https://github.com/plankanban/planka)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Ticketing

*   [Zammad](https://zammad.org/) - Easy to use but powerful open-source support and ticketing system. ([Source Code (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/zammad/zammad)) `AGPL-3.0` `Ruby/deb`

### Software / URL Shorteners

*   [Shlink](https://shlink.io) - URL shortener with REST API and command line interface. Includes official progressive web application and docker images. ([Source Code (⭐4k)](https://github.com/shlinkio/shlink), [Clients](https://shlink.io/apps)) `MIT` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Wikis

*   [Wiki.js](https://js.wiki/) - Modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app using Git and Markdown. ([Demo](https://docs.requarks.io), [Source Code (⭐27k)](https://github.com/Requarks/wiki)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker/K8S`
*   [Wikmd (⭐383)](https://github.com/Linbreux/wikmd) - Modern and simple file based wiki that uses Markdown and Git. `MIT` `Python/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Calendar & Contacts

  • DAViCal - Server for calendar sharing (CalDAV) that uses a PostgreSQL database as a data store. (Source Code) GPL-2.0 PHP/deb
  • Radicale - Simple calendar and contact server with extremely low administrative overhead. (Source Code (⭐3.8k)) GPL-3.0 Python/deb
  • Xandikos (⭐502) - Open source CardDAV and CalDAV server with minimal administrative overhead, backed by a Git repository. GPL-3.0 Python/deb

Software / Feed Readers

  • Feedpushr (⭐369) - Powerful RSS aggregator, able to transform and send articles to many outputs. Single binary, extensible with plugins. GPL-3.0 Go/Docker
  • JARR - JARR (Just Another RSS Reader) is a web-based news aggregator and reader (fork of Newspipe). (Demo, Source Code (⭐125)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Python
  • RSS-Bridge (⭐8.1k) - Generate RSS/ATOM feeds for websites which don't have one. Unlicense PHP/Docker

Software / File Transfer & Synchronization

  • ownCloud - All-in-one solution for saving, synchronizing, viewing, editing and sharing files, calendars, address books and more. (Source Code (⭐8.6k), Clients (⭐8.6k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker/deb
  • Syncthing - Syncthing is an open source peer-to-peer file synchronisation tool. (Source Code (⭐73k)) MPL-2.0 Go/Docker/deb
  • Unison - Unison is a file-synchronization tool for OSX, Unix, and Windows. (Source Code (⭐4.7k)) GPL-3.0 deb/OCaml

Software / File Transfer - Object Storage & File Servers

  • SFTPGo (⭐11k) - Flexible, fully featured and highly configurable SFTP server with optional FTP/S and WebDAV support. AGPL-3.0 Go/deb/Docker
  • Zenko CloudServer - Zenko CloudServer, an open-source implementation of a server handling the Amazon S3 protocol. (Source Code (⭐1.8k)) Apache-2.0 Docker/Nodejs

Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

  • Gokapi (⭐2k) - Lightweight server to share files, which expire after a set amount of downloads or days. Similar to the discontinued Firefox Send, with the difference that only the admin is allowed to upload files. GPL-3.0 Go/Docker
  • Sharry (⭐1k) - Share files easily over the internet between authenticated and anonymous users (both ways) with resumable up- and downloads. GPL-3.0 Scala/Java/deb/Docker
  • XBackBone - A simple, fast and lightweight file manager with instant sharing tools integration, like ShareX (a free and open-source screenshot utility for Windows). (Source Code (⭐1.1k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker
  • Zipline (⭐2.3k) - A lightweight, fast and reliable file sharing server that is commonly used with ShareX, offering a react-based Web UI and fast API. MIT Docker/Nodejs

Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

  • FileGator - FileGator is a powerful multi-user file manager with a single page front-end. (Demo, Source Code (⭐2.5k)) MIT PHP/Docker

Software / Games

  • The Battle for Wesnoth (⭐6k) - The Battle for Wesnoth is an Open Source, turn-based tactical strategy game with a high fantasy theme, featuring both singleplayer and online/hotseat multiplayer combat. GPL-2.0 C++/deb

Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

  • Sunshine - Remote game stream host for Moonlight with support up to 120 frames per second and 4K resolution. (Source Code (⭐27k)) GPL-3.0 C++/deb/Docker

Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

  • Node RED - Browser-based flow editor that helps you wiring hardware devices, APIs and online services to create IoT solutions. (Source Code (⭐21k)) Apache-2.0 Nodejs/Docker
  • Thingsboard - Open-source IoT Platform - Device management, data collection, processing and visualization. (Demo, Source Code (⭐19k)) Apache-2.0 Java/Docker/K8S

Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

  • OwnTracks Recorder (⭐1k) ⚠ - Store and access data published by OwnTracks location tracking apps. GPL-2.0 C/Lua/deb/Docker
  • TileServer GL - Vector and raster maps with GL styles. Server side rendering by Mapbox GL Native. Map tile server for Mapbox GL JS, Android, iOS, Leaflet, OpenLayers, GIS via WMTS, etc. (Source Code (⭐2.5k)) BSD-2-Clause Nodejs/Docker

Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • Beets - Music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger (command-line and Web interface). (Source Code (⭐14k)) MIT Python/deb
  • gonic (⭐2k) - Lightweight music streaming server. Subsonic compatible. GPL-3.0 Go/Docker
  • LMS (⭐1.3k) - Access your self-hosted music using a web interface. GPL-3.0 Docker/deb/C++
  • musikcube - Streaming audio server with Linux/macOS/Windows/Android clients. (Source Code (⭐4.5k)) BSD-3-Clause C++/deb
  • Polaris (⭐2.3k) - Music browsing and streaming application optimized for large music collections, ease of use and high performance. MIT Rust/Docker
  • Snapcast (⭐6.8k) - Synchronous multiroom audio server. GPL-3.0 C++/deb
  • SwingMusic - Swing Music is a beautiful, self-hosted music player and streaming server for your local audio files. Like a cooler Spotify ... but bring your own music. (Source Code (⭐1.1k)) MIT Python/Docker

Software / Media Streaming - Multimedia Streaming

  • Karaoke Eternal - Host awesome karaoke parties where everyone can easily find and queue songs from their phone's browser. The player is also fully browser-based with support for MP3+G, MP4 and WebGL visualizations. (Source Code) ISC Docker/Nodejs
  • Kodi - Multimedia/Entertainment center, formerly known as XBMC. Runs on Android, BSD, Linux, macOS, iOS and Windows. (Source Code (⭐20k)) GPL-2.0 C++/deb
  • Stash - A web-based library organizer and player for your adult media stash, with auto-tagging and metadata scraping support. (Source Code (⭐11k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Go
  • µStreamer (⭐1.8k) - Lightweight and very quick server to stream MJPEG video from any V4L2 device to the net. GPL-3.0 C/deb

Software / Media Streaming - Video Streaming

  • Invidious (⭐18k) ⚠ - Alternative YouTube front-end. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Crystal

Software / Miscellaneous

  • F-Droid - Server tools for maintaining an F-Droid repository system. (Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Python/Docker/deb
  • graph-vl (⭐64) - Identity document verification using Machine Learning and GraphQL. MIT Python/Docker/K8S
  • Koillection - Koillection is a service allowing users to manage any kind of collections. (Source Code (⭐885)) MIT Docker/PHP
  • Teleport - Certificate authority and access plane for SSH, Kubernetes, web applications, and databases. (Source Code (⭐19k)) Apache-2.0 Go/Docker/K8S
  • TeslaMate (⭐6.9k) - A powerful data logger for Tesla vehicles. MIT Elixir/Docker
  • WeeWX - Open source software for your weather station. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.1k)) GPL-3.0 Python/deb

Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

  • Firefly III - Firefly III is a modern financial manager. It helps you to keep track of your money and make budget forecasts. It supports credit cards, has an advanced rule engine and can import data from many banks. (Demo, Source Code (⭐20k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker

Software / Note-taking & Editors

  • draw.io - Diagram software for making flowcharts, process diagrams, org charts, UML, ER and network diagrams. (Source Code (⭐1.9k)) Apache-2.0 Javascript/Docker
  • Livebook - Realtime collaborative notebook app based on Markdown that supports running Elixir code snippets, TeX and Mermaid Diagrams. Easily deployed using Docker or Elixir. (Source Code (⭐5.4k)) Apache-2.0 Elixir/Docker

Software / Office Suites

  • ONLYOFFICE - Office suite that enables you to manage documents, projects, team and customer relations in one place. (Source Code (⭐5.6k)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker

Software / Password Managers

  • PassIt - Simple password manage with sharing features by group and user, but no administration interface. (Demo, Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Django
  • Vaultwarden (⭐47k) - Lightweight Bitwarden server API implementation written in Rust. GPL-3.0 Rust/Docker

Software / Pastebins

  • dpaste - Simple pastebin with multiple text and code option, with short url result easy to remember. (Source Code (⭐572)) MIT Docker/Django
  • Hemmelig - Share encrypted secrets cross organizations, or as private persons. (Source Code (⭐896)) MIT Docker/Nodejs
  • Wastebin (⭐574) - Lightweight, minimal and fast pastebin with an SQLite backend. (Demo) MIT Rust/Docker
  • YABin (⭐186) - A pastebin that contains plentiful features while remaining simple. Supports optional E2E encryption, a client-side CLI app, syntax highlighting, minimalistic UI, APIs, keyboard shortcuts, and more. It can even be run in serverless environments. (Demo) MIT Nodejs/Docker

Software / Personal Dashboards

  • LinkStack - Link all your social media platforms easily accessible on one page, customizable through an intuitive, easy to use user/admin interface (alternative to Linktree and Manylink). (Demo, Source Code (⭐3k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker

Software / Photo Galleries

  • Chevereto - Ultimate image sharing software. Create your very own personal image hosting website in just minutes. (Source Code (⭐730)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker
  • PhotoPrism - Personal photo management powered by Go and Google TensorFlow. Browse, organize, and share your personal photo collection, using the latest technologies to automatically tag and find pictures. (Demo, Source Code (⭐38k)) AGPL-3.0 Go/Docker
  • SPIS (⭐169) - A simple, lightweight and fast media server with decent mobile support. GPL-3.0 Docker/Rust

Software / Polls and Events

  • docassemble - A free, open-source expert system for guided interviews and document assembly, based on Python, YAML, and Markdown. (Demo, Source Code (⭐857)) MIT Docker/Python
  • Fider - Open platform to collect and prioritize feedback (alternative to UserVoice). (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.6k)) MIT Docker

Software / Proxy

  • sish (⭐4.3k) - HTTP(S)/WS(S)/TCP tunnels to localhost using only SSH (serveo/ngrok alternative). MIT Go/Docker
  • socks5-proxy-server (⭐122) - SOCKS5 proxy server with built-in authentication and Telegram-bot for user management and user statistics on data spent (handy when you pay per GB of data). It is dockerised and simple to install. Apache-2.0 Docker

Software / Resource Planning

  • LedgerSMB - Integrated accounting and ERP system for small and midsize businesses, with double entry accounting, budgeting, invoicing, quotations, projects, orders and inventory management, shipping and more. (Demo, Source Code (⭐481)) GPL-2.0 Docker/Perl
  • Odoo - Free open source ERP system. (Demo, Source Code (⭐44k)) LGPL-3.0 Python/deb/Docker

Software / Search Engines

  • Jina (⭐22k) - Cloud-native neural search framework for any kind of data. Apache-2.0 Python/Docker
  • MeiliSearch - Ultra relevant, instant and typo-tolerant full-text search API. (Source Code (⭐52k)) MIT Rust/Docker/deb
  • sist2 (⭐1.1k) - Lightning-fast file system indexer and search tool. GPL-3.0 C/Docker
  • Typesense - Blazing fast, typo-tolerant open source search engine optimized for developer happiness and ease of use. (Source Code (⭐24k)) GPL-3.0 C++/Docker/K8S/deb
  • Yacy - Peer based, decentralized search engine server. (Source Code (⭐3.6k)) GPL-2.0 Java/Docker/K8S
  • ZincSearch - Search engine that requires minimal resources (alternative to Elasticsearch). (Demo (⭐17k), Source Code (⭐17k)) Apache-2.0 Go/Docker/K8S

Software / Software Development - API Management

  • DreamFactory - Turns any SQL/NoSQL/Structured data into Restful API. (Source Code (⭐1.6k)) Apache-2.0 PHP/Docker/K8S
  • form.io - A REST API building platform that utilizes a drag & drop form builder, and is application framework agnostic. Contains open source and enterprise version. (Demo, Source Code) MIT Nodejs/Docker
  • Fusio - Open-source API management platform which helps to build and manage REST APIs. (Demo, Source Code (⭐2k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker
  • Hasura - Fast, instant realtime GraphQL APIs on Postgres with fine grained access control, also trigger webhooks on database events. (Source Code (⭐32k)) Apache-2.0 Haskell/Docker/K8S
  • Para - Flexible and modular backend framework/server for object persistence, API development and authentication. (Source Code (⭐545)) Apache-2.0 Java/Docker
  • Tyk - Fast and scalable open source API Gateway. Out of the box, Tyk offers an API Management Platform with an API Gateway, API Analytics, Developer Portal and API Management Dashboard. (Source Code (⭐10k)) MPL-2.0 Go/Docker/K8S

Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

  • Atheos - Web-based IDE framework with a small footprint and minimal requirements, continued from Codiad. (Source Code (⭐551)) MIT PHP/Docker
  • Coder - Remote development machines on your own infrastructure. (Source Code (⭐10k)) AGPL-3.0 Go/Docker/K8S/deb
  • Lowdefy - Build internal tools, BI dashboards, admin panels, CRUD apps and workflows in minutes using YAML / JSON on an self-hosted, open-source platform. Connect to your data sources, host via Serverless, Netlify or Docker. (Source Code (⭐2.8k)) Apache-2.0 Nodejs/Docker
  • Wakapi - Tracking tool for coding statistics, compatible with WakaTime. (Source Code (⭐3.5k)) GPL-3.0 Go/Docker

Software / Software Development - Localization

  • Traduora - Translation management platform for teams. (Source Code (⭐2.1k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/K8S/Nodejs

Software / Software Development - Low Code

  • ToolJet - Low-code framework to build & deploy internal tools with minimal engineering effort (alternative to Retool & Mendix). (Source Code (⭐36k)) GPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker/K8S

Software / Software Development - Project Management

  • GitLab - Self Hosted Git repository management, code reviews, issue tracking, activity feeds and wikis. (Demo, Source Code) MIT Ruby/deb/Docker/K8S
  • Klaus (⭐691) - Simple, easy-to-set-up Git web viewer that Just Works. ISC Python/Docker
  • Octobox ⚠ - Take back control of your GitHub Notifications. (Source Code (⭐4.4k)) AGPL-3.0 Ruby/Docker
  • OneDev - All-In-One DevOps Platform. With Git Management, Issue Tracking, and CI/CD. Simple yet Powerful. (Source Code) MIT Java/Docker/K8S
  • Review Board - Extensible and friendly code review tool for projects and companies of all sizes. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.6k)) MIT Python/Docker
  • SCM Manager - The easiest way to share and manage your Git, Mercurial and Subversion repositories over http. (Source Code (⭐147)) BSD-3-Clause Java/deb/Docker/K8S
  • Titra - Time-tracking solution for freelancers and small teams. (Source Code (⭐429)) GPL-3.0 Javascript/Docker

Software / Task Management & To-do Lists

  • Focalboard - Define, organize, track and manage work across individuals and teams (alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana). (Source Code (⭐24k), Clients) MIT/AGPL-3.0/Apache-2.0 Nodejs/Go/Docker
  • Planka - Realtime kanban board for workgroups (alternative to Trello). (Demo, Source Code (⭐10k)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker/K8S

Software / Ticketing

  • Zammad - Easy to use but powerful open-source support and ticketing system. (Source Code (⭐4.9k)) AGPL-3.0 Ruby/deb

Software / URL Shorteners

  • Shlink - URL shortener with REST API and command line interface. Includes official progressive web application and docker images. (Source Code (⭐4k), Clients) MIT PHP/Docker

Software / Wikis

  • Wiki.js - Modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app using Git and Markdown. (Demo, Source Code (⭐27k)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker/K8S
  • Wikmd (⭐383) - Modern and simple file based wiki that uses Markdown and Git. MIT Python/Docker

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Go Generate Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [re2dfa](https://gitlab.com/opennota/re2dfa) - Transform regular expressions into finite state machines and output Go source code.
items.content_html:
Go Generate Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • re2dfa - Transform regular expressions into finite state machines and output Go source code.
